name: TUNKY
description:
Story: A strange creature named Tunky has captured you and tossed you into his old decrepit house to play a game of hunt. He will patrol the house to try to find you and if he does, he will devour you... So hide anywhere you can, and try to find a way out.

I decided to try something a little different. I felt like making a more abstract horror game that had low-res graphics, an AI that has a set path instead of walking around aimlessly and some new hiding mechanics I'm testing out in this game.

I hope you enjoy my short experimental horror game!
